Name: Drama
Description: Drama films explore realistic characters, emotional themes, and interpersonal conflict.

Name: Romance
Description: Romance films center on love stories and emotional relationships between characters.

Name: Comedy
Description: Comedy films are designed to make the audience laugh through amusement and humor.

Name: Crime
Description: Crime films focus on the lives of criminals and the consequences of criminal acts.

Name: History
Description: History films depict past events, notable figures, and historic achievements.

Name: Biography
Description: Biography films tell the life story of a real person or highlight significant life events.

Name: Adventure
Description: Adventure films are exciting stories, with new experiences or exotic locales.

Name: Fantasy
Description: Fantasy films include magical elements, mythical creatures, and fantastical worlds.

Name: Thriller
Description: Thriller films use suspense, tension, and excitement to keep the audience on edge.

Name: Animation
Description: Animation films are created using drawings, CGI, or stop-motion to tell a story.

Name: Family
Description: Family films are made to be suitable and enjoyable for children and adults alike.

Name: Musical
Description: Musical films incorporate songs and dance to advance the plot or develop characters.

Name: Mystery
Description: Mystery films revolve around the solution of a puzzle or crime.

Name: Action
Description: Action movies are characterized by a resourceful hero struggling against incredible odds, which may include life-threatening situations, a villain, or pursuit.

Name: War
Description: War films focus on battles, military life, and the effects of conflict on individuals.

Name: Western
Description: Western films are set in the American frontier, often featuring cowboys and outlaws.

Name: Sci-Fi
Description: Sci-Fi films explore futuristic concepts, space exploration, and advanced technology.

Name: Horror
Description: Horror films aim to evoke fear, often featuring supernatural elements or psychological terror.
